## VMFactory type

The virtual machine factory provided by each virtual machine provider. It is a function that takes the configuration and asynchronously returns an object that implements the [VM](./vm-providers.vm.md) interface.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type VMFactory<T> = (config: VMConfig<T>) => Promise<VM>;
```
<b>References:</b> [VMConfig](./vm-providers.vmconfig.md)<!-- -->, [VM](./vm-providers.vm.md)
